posts.post_content: I love this card. GREAT utility effect, and when that's not useful, a 2/1 first strike for ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol), and a vampire? I'll take at least three. And when that utility effect does need to go boom, ho boy, does it go BOOM. Why, that's a nice Planeswalker you have there. Shame to see it die immediately. And shut downs a lot of combos that rely on counters.
